explains: n. 穆斯林的头巾；女用头巾；无檐帽，狭边帽
n. （Turban）人名；（德）图尔班；（法）蒂尔邦

sentences.en: Like the ambassador, Bhopal has a black turban and a thick beard.
sentences.cn: 像大使一样，博帕尔有一个黑色的头巾和浓密的络腮胡。

sentences.en: I tied myself strongly to it with my turban in hopes that the roc next morning would carry me with her out of this desert island.
sentences.cn: 我用头巾把自己紧紧地绑在上面，希望隔天早上若克鸟会带我离开这个荒岛。

sentences.en: He is a 37-year-old man with the distinct Mongolian features characteristic of the borderlands, and he wears a brown tunic, a turban, and a tentative smile.
sentences.cn: 他是一个37岁的男人，身上有着明显的边境地区蒙古人的特征，他穿着一件棕色的束腰外衣、戴着条头巾、面带着腼腆的微笑。
